name: Apparel and Accessories
description: Retailers offering clothing, footwear, and accessories for men, women, and children, including fashion, athletic, and outdoor wear.

name: Beauty and Personal Care
description: Stores selling cosmetics, skincare, haircare, fragrances, and personal care products, including luxury, mass, and natural brands.

name: Electronics and Appliances
description: Retailers offering consumer electronics, home appliances, and gadgets, including TVs, smartphones, laptops, and kitchen appliances.

name: Food and Beverage
description: Stores selling fresh produce, meat, dairy, baked goods, and prepared foods, as well as specialty and gourmet products.

name: Furniture and Home Decor
description: Retailers offering furniture, mattresses, home textiles, and decorative items for the home, including indoor and outdoor living spaces.

name: Health and Wellness
description: Stores selling vitamins, supplements, fitness equipment, and healthy living products, including natural food and beverage options.

name: Home Improvement and Gardening
description: Retailers offering building materials, tools, and gardening supplies for DIY projects and home maintenance.

name: Jewelry and Watches
description: Stores selling fine jewelry, fashion jewelry, watches, and luxury accessories, including precious metals and gemstones.

name: Kids and Baby Products
description: Retailers offering toys, games, nursery furniture, strollers, and baby care products for infants and children.

name: Pet Products and Supplies
description: Stores selling pet food, toys, grooming products, and accessories for dogs, cats, and other small animals.

name: Sports and Outdoor
description: Retailers offering athletic equipment, outdoor gear, and recreational products, including camping, hiking, and cycling supplies.

name: Toys and Games
description: Stores selling traditional toys, board games, puzzles, and educational products for children and adults.
